document.full_text: the father of a u.s. soldier who was captured in afghanistan two years ago on friday posted an online appeal asking the government of pakistan and its armed forces to help free his son.
document.title: father of captured u.s. soldier asks for son's freedom
lines_and_colors: the father of a u.s. soldier who was captured in afghanistan two years ago on friday posted an online appeal asking the government of pakistan and its armed forces to help free his son.
